welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bad Nauheim! Known for its charming spas and beautiful parks, this picturesque city invites you to relax and explore its unique culture. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving a variety of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, mainly used by Lufthansa and its Star Alliance partners.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport. Premium wifi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for military and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
